Name: Does the abstract have to be in English?
Description: The abstract, as well as presentation, will have to be in English.

Name: How about the abstract template?
Description:
Title of abstract in Arial font: size 14 point, boldfaced, centered paragraph, max. 15 words 

Author Name (Bold) 

Institution/ Affiliation, Country (use semicolons for multiple institutions)

 Email address (use semicolons for multiple email addresses)  

The one-page abstracts should be typed using 11 pt Arial, single-spaced on standard A4 paper (297 x 210 mm), leaving a 3.25 cm on the top and 2.54 cm on the rest sides. The abstract should begin with the title (bold, Arial, 15 pt, centered), the authors’ names (Arial, 12 pt, bold, centered) and institutions/ affiliations (Arial, 12 pt, centered). Please provide three to five keywords in 11 pt Arial.

Name: How many abstracts can we submit for KIPI?
Description:
Each person is allowed to send in a maximum of two abstracts.

This includes co-authoring a maximum of two abstracts.

Name: What do I include in the abstract?
Description:
The abstract should be a 150-250 words abstract.  We have no strict guidelines on the layout of the abstract. 

The abstract template could be seen here: https://bit.ly/KIPI2022AbstractTemplate .

Please send us your abstracts in either Microsoft Word or pdf form through this link:  https://linktr.ee/KIPI2022Presenters 

In the abstract, please include the title of your paper, along with the name(s) of the author(s) and their institutional affiliations.
